name: adam
title: Adam Cesar
text: Adam is the main character of 'The Good Fight of Faith'. You will guide him on adventures throughout the Land of Allegoria, warring against the powers of darkness and liberating precious souls from their grasp.
inspiration: Adam Cesar has been my best friend and brother in Christ since 2007. When I began to work on the game, I needed a main character, and he was the first person I thought of. But I like that his name is Adam, because he represents the everyman - anyone from Adam's race who is redeemed to become a new creature in Jesus Christ.

name: milk
title: Milk
text: "As newborn babes, desire the sincere milk of the word, that ye may grow thereby:" (1 Peter 2:2)
inspiration: Hebrews 5:12 describes the "first principles of the oracles of God" as "milk". 1 Peter 2:2 tells us that this "sincere milk of the word" is important for the growth of newborn babes in Christ.

name: meat
title: Meat
text: "Jesus saith unto them, My meat is to do the will of him that sent me, and to finish his work." (John 4:34)
inspiration: Moving beyond the "first principles" of milk, Jesus teaches us in John 4:34 that the real diet of a Christian consists in doing the Father's will.

name: seed
title: Seed
text: "He that goeth forth and weepeth, bearing precious seed, shall doubtless come again with rejoicing, bringing his sheaves with him." (Psalm 126:6)
inspiration: The Bible often speaks of the word of God as a seed, some of the most notable passages being Isaiah 55:10-11, Luke 8:11, and 1 Peter 1:23.

name: sermon
title: Sermon
text: "Cry aloud, spare not, lift up thy voice like a trumpet, and shew my people their transgression, and the house of Jacob their sins." (Isaiah 58:1)
inspiration: As preachers of the gospel, we sometimes cry aloud with our voice like a trumpet, proclaiming a message to many people at once. In modern times, a bullhorn is particularly effective.

name: strong_meat
title: Strong Meat
text: "But strong meat belongeth to them that are of full age, even those who by reason of use have their senses exercised to discern both good and evil." (Hebrews 5:14)
inspiration: In Hebrews 5, Paul speaks of the perfection of Christ by the things which he suffered as "strong meat", reserved for those of "full age" who have grown to the measure of the stature of the fulness of Christ. (Ephesians 4:13)
